groups.description: groups is the groups you're testing for.

template.description: template is the PodTemplateSpec to check. If template.spec.serviceAccountName is empty it will not be defaulted. If its non-empty, it will be checked.

user.description: user is the user you're testing for. If you specify "user" but not "group", then is it interpreted as "What if user were not a member of any groups. If user and groups are empty, then the check is performed using *only* the serviceAccountName in the template.
